name: calm
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 peaceful, quiet, and without worry: He has a very calm manner. Now keep calm everyone, the police are on their way.
without hurried movement or noise: After a night of fighting, the streets are now calm.
B1 If the weather is calm, there is no wind, or if the sea or a lake is calm, it is still and has no waves.
More examplesFewer examplesI was extremely angry but I'm feeling a little calmer now.He seemed calm on the surface although I suspect he was furious inside.You've got to appear calm in an interview even if you're terrified underneath.He usually stays quite calm in meetings but this time he just lost his head.She spoke with calm assurance.
